section.section: The Commissioner shall issue a license in a kind or subdivision of insurance or a combination of kinds or subdivisions of insurance to each applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle.

To help the Department of Assessments and Taxation in identifying new businesses in the State, by August 31 of each year the Commissioner shall provide to the Department of Assessments and Taxation a list of insurance producers that were issued licenses during the previous fiscal year.

The list shall include:
the name and mailing address of each person issued a license; and
the federal tax identification number of each person or, if the person does not have a federal tax identification number, the Social Security number of the person.
The Commissioner shall provide the list free of charge.
